StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateQSN_Unassign]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ContractID int, @LastEditBy varchar(50) ) AS
UPDATE [MCRISS].[dbo].[QSN] SET [CONTRACT_ID] = null ,[BONUS_CONTROL_NUMBER] = null ,[BONUS_AMOUNT] = null ,[KICKER_CONTROL] = null ,[PROGRAM_ASSIGNMENT_DATE] = null ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID
